Jargon Term: you will need to complete a 14-day course of levofloxacin for this, and afterwards you will need to be on a medicine called norfloxacin daily to prevent further infections
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: seek medical attention if you develop fevers, chills, or worsening abdominal pain
